description: Try our easy to follow Vegan-Aise Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mayonnaise,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mushroom,Zucchini,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Cauliflower,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Vegan-Aise Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place cauliflower into a food processor and pulse until finely chopped. Transfer to a large bowl. Repeat with onion, carrot, zucchini and mushroom, processing each vegetable separately to prevent them becoming soft and mushy.

Heat oil in a deep saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and vegetables and cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes. Stir in passata and 1 cup water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes or until vegetables are soft and a rich sauce forms. Season. Stir sauce through cooked pasta and top with basil leaves.
